text:
Mohamed Ennaceur (; born 21 March 1934) is a Tunisian politician. He is the acting President of Tunisia from 25 July 2019 after the death of President Beji Caid Essebsi until 23 October 2019.
Since 2014 he is the President of the Assembly of the Representatives of the People and leader of the governing Nidaa Tounes party. He was Minister of Social Affairs in the 1970s and 1980s under President Habib Bourguiba, and again in 2011 in the transitional Ghannouchi and Essebsi governments.

annotations.surface_form: President of the Assembly of the Representatives of the People
